item.title: Active Clearance Control (ACC) Cooling System Valves (PW) – High Pressure Turbine ACC Valves

remarks.para: One may be inoperative closed provided valve is verified closed or blanked with a blanking plate.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "(L) (R) HPT CASE COOLING AIR VALVE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
